title: BANKING OPERATIONS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English, Geography, Office Practice, Government, Biology/ Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Typewriting, Shorthand.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Geography, History, Government, Commerce or Principles of Accounts.
